name: fantasy-plants-compendium
title: Fantasy Plants Compendium
description: A module that includes over 600 fantasy plants from Broderick's Compendium: Plants and Fungi Across the Realm (version 2.0) (Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/DnD/comments/83oupp/brodericks_compendium_plants_and_fungi_across_the/ ). This addon includes rolltables for Arctic, City, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Jungle, Mountain, Ocean, Plains, River, Swamp, and Underdark/Cave regions as per the source material.
author: iHaveReturnd
